about me

Hi! 👋🏼 I'm Deanna, creative developer and digital designer.

Just graduated from Communication and Multimedia Design at the Amsterdam University of Applied Sciences as a frontend + backend webdeveloper and digital designer. During my study, I've chosen to follow all the tech-related courses. My main focus and passion lies within Web Design and Development, using mostly JavaScript.
